Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 127 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 127 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 255 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 255 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

resource.description: The resource schema to create a CodeArtifact repository.

properties.name: DomainName
properties.description: The name of the domain that contains the repository.

type.description: The name of the domain that contains the repository.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A text description of the repository.

type.description: A text description of the repository.

properties.name: ExternalConnections
properties.description: A list of external connections associated with the repository.

type.description: A list of external connections associated with the repository.

properties.name: Upstreams
properties.description: A list of upstream repositories associated with the repository.

type.description: A list of upstream repositories associated with the repository.

properties.name: PermissionsPolicyDocument
properties.description: The access control resource policy on the provided repository.

type.description: The access control resource policy on the provided repository.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

attributes.description: The resource schema to create a CodeArtifact repository.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the repository. This is used for GetAtt

type.description: The name of the repository. This is used for GetAtt

properties.name: DomainOwner
properties.description: The 12-digit account ID of the AWS account that owns the domain.

type.description: The 12-digit account ID of the AWS account that owns the domain.
